name: Tactical Application
description: Training for real-world combat applications, ensuring adaptive decision-making and practical execution of combat techniques.

workout_groups.name: Fundamental Tactical Maneuvers
workout_groups.description: Building a foundation of strategic movement, weapon control, and combat efficiency.

workouts.name: Basic Combat Entry & Exit
workouts.description: Practice entering combat range, executing a strike, and disengaging safely.

workouts.name: Angle Control & Positional Advantage
workouts.description: Move at different angles while maintaining an offensive advantage.

workouts.name: Cover & Concealment Utilization
workouts.description: Practice moving between cover points while maintaining combat readiness.

workouts.name: Controlled Striking Under Pressure
workouts.description: Execute controlled strikes while maintaining defensive awareness.

workout_groups.name: Adaptive Combat Scenarios
workout_groups.description: Training to react dynamically to evolving combat situations.

workouts.name: Unpredictable Threat Response Drill
workouts.description: React to randomized combat scenarios with immediate decision-making.

workouts.name: Multi-Weapon Transition in Combat
workouts.description: Switch between different weapons mid-combat to maintain advantage.

workouts.name: Reactive Tactical Sparring
workouts.description: Engage in sparring with randomized attack and defense conditions.

workouts.name: Engagement & Disengagement Timing
workouts.description: Control combat tempo by choosing when to engage or retreat.

workout_groups.name: Elite Tactical Combat Execution
workout_groups.description: Mastering high-level situational combat efficiency and decision-making.

workouts.name: Combat Psychology & Deception Tactics
workouts.description: Use mental conditioning and misdirection to gain an advantage in combat.

workouts.name: Multi-Opponent Tactical Strategy
workouts.description: Engage and control multiple opponents through movement and attack prioritization.

workouts.name: Combat in Restricted Environments
workouts.description: Adapt techniques to fight effectively in confined spaces or uneven terrain.

workouts.name: Live Tactical Combat Engagement
workouts.description: Apply all tactical skills in a full-speed, high-pressure combat scenario.
